Summary: Circle of purple lights with blue lights underneath.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around March 20th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and my friend were driving down South Mopac from 1826 when my friend pointed out the object as he was driving. I saw a circle of purple lights hovering, bobbing, and doing a sort of spin to our left, flying away from us. I did not want to stop and investigate, being in a moderately secluded area; roughly two minutes later, we turned around to investigate further, me picking up my courage, and there was no trace of it anywhere in the sky. Its physical features were a circular, possibly disc-like, with a ring of purple lights around it; as it bobbed, I saw its underside, with four very bright blue lights underneath it. We did not get any pictures, as I was initially too shocked to want to stop, and I assumed we only had our cell phones. I have included a very rough drawing of it; please excuse it if it isn't any help; I am not artistically gifted in any definition of the term.
